abstract: Judge Allyne R Ross of Federal District Court in Brooklyn sentences brothers Rex and Wilfredo Maralit to three years in prison for smuggling military-grade weapons to Philippines between January 2009 and September 2013; brothers used their official roles in law enforcement to facilitate illegal gun trade; Rex Maralit was New York City police officer at the time of the smuggling operation.
lead_paragraph: The two men, a former New York police officer and a federal customs officer, were sentenced after illegally shipping military-grade weapons to the Philippines.

headline.main: Brothers Sentenced to Three Years for Selling Guns Overseas
headline.print_headline: Brothers Sentenced to Prison for Selling Guns Overseas

snippet: The two men, a former New York police officer and a federal customs officer, were sentenced after illegally shipping military-grade weapons to the Philippines.
